html:
11.28.20  3:26 pm   When are you going to make a new video?

      doing it now

11.28.20  2:53 pm   do you think cloning or immortality would be a good solution to your struggle to get as much stuff out with your limited time?

      immortality would be helpful, cloning makes no sense as a solution and i have no idea why that would be relevant here. i think you may be confusing cloning with some kind of teleportation/timewarp strategy

11.28.20  1:08 pm   what is consciousness 

      it's you

11.28.20  12:57 pm   when do you think you'll reach the limit of coming up with creative responses to "(when) will there be a new video?"? 

      i don't recall ever coming up with a creative response to that

11.28.20  12:49 pm   Will you make a new christmas video

      i will make as many as i can

11.28.20  12:28 pm   im going to mcdonalds do u want anything

      'fish delight'

11.28.20  11:38 am   Would you prefer to make a new video to make THAT one your new favorite?

      i always try while i am making it, then a negotiation has to occur just before release where i have to convince myself it is the best one, and then after it's released i stop worrying about it and turn my attention to the next one. and so the cycle continues

11.28.20  11:27 am   I feel weird, thoughts?

      that makes sense. all feelings are weird

11.28.20  10:39 am   What did you mean by "do you remember the day we pretended to be every star in the sky,"?

     analyzing it now, it sounds like i was putting the chords as 1st priority, melody as second priority, and lyric as 3rd priority. this is unfortunate, and goes against company policy, and makes that line weaker than it should have been

     I love might quit.

11.28.20  10:18 am   Will you make new video in the future ?

      double it, triple it, multiply it times one hundred, then you might be somewhere getting into what i call the 'reasonability zone'

11.28.20  10:17 am   Is you human person?

      oh that would explain a lot

11.28.20  8:43 am   What software do you use to edit? 

      unfortunately i think they all suck, so i don't know. i should clarify, this is not any problem with any software, this is more of a personal problem i've been having

11.28.20  7:51 am   Have you ever thought of compiling your songs to an album?

      yes, i've tried that. there are certain times in life when that seems appropriate, but usually i don't do that. the individual songs are much much more important to me

11.28.20  6:43 am   I saw in a previous question your predicted the year to be bad with the simpsons method, that said, do you think Mt. Saint Helens is about to blow up?

      probably not

11.28.20  6:22 am   When will you make the new video

      there are a couple things wrong with this: you say it as if it is a future plan, but if it's a future plan it would never be just 1. the idea of only being able to make 1 video is one of the sadder traumas i am still running from, to this day

11.28.20  5:21 am   what is a question

      i'm not sure

11.28.20  4:28 am   how do I get through high school? i want to do something at least vaguely similar to what you do 

      i wrote songs in my head during school. i also had a number system to be able to write notation on normal paper, without music lines. very useful

11.28.20  3:52 am   What's the best concept for a video you've had that never came out?

      no spoilers

11.28.20  3:25 am   Is death a capitalist lie?

      no

11.28.20  2:29 am   what do you think of aspen trees?

      each one is like a blank canvas

11.28.20  2:18 am   am i dreaming?

      yes and no

11.28.20  1:43 am   Hey, Bill, why do I like your music so much, more importantly, why does my sister not like it so much- a matter of even greater importance, how can I make her like it more?

      that's not what's important here. what's important, is this sort of 'good cop bad cop' strategy you are using, trying to paint other people as my enemies so you can make yourself seem like the nicer one in this scenario

11.28.20  12:47 am   how do you feel about coconuts?

      can be carried

11.28.20  12:18 am   whos your favourite garfield charachter 

      the house

11.27.20  11:37 pm   What's your favorite video you made

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

11.27.20  11:37 pm   What is the most unorthodox source of inspiration for you?

      the orthodox church

11.27.20  11:08 pm   Are you ever ganna make a new video 

      that's not as many videos as i would prefer

11.27.20  11:02 pm   did you have a good thanksgiving?

      never heard of it

11.27.20  10:49 pm   When does Christmastime start?

      december 26

11.27.20  10:35 pm   Can you give me an estimate of how long you'll take on this project?

      what project

11.27.20  10:28 pm   boxers or briefs

      which is the one with the superpowers

11.27.20  10:05 pm   what do you like?

      rules that are the exception to themselves

11.27.20  9:49 pm   Is Christmas real?

      yes, despite its best efforts to be fake

11.27.20  8:33 pm   how do you feel about christmas music?

      it can be very..... potent

11.27.20  7:22 pm   how does success feel?

      i'll let you know when i see it

11.27.20  6:34 pm   opinions on snow?

      i'm still trying to figure out what color it is

11.27.20  5:23 pm   did you get a new car

      no

11.27.20  4:51 pm   what else do you like to do when you're not making videos or music?

      make strategies to make videos and music in higher quantities and qualities

11.27.20  4:45 pm   What is the coast guard guarding?

      the rest of the land

11.27.20  3:30 pm   How do you spell "necessary"?

      i'm not sure

11.27.20  3:01 pm   Why is it that you wrote the best pop album of the last 5 years and it's all in individual singles?  Full album anytime plz?  

     it sounds like you and i agree, it's best to do singles

     It's genre would be jazpopock

     no i disagree with that

11.27.20  2:35 pm   Why was 6 afraid of 7?

      because of its size

11.27.20  2:04 pm   is thought required for understanding?

      almost

11.27.20  1:55 pm   What is one thing you hate about Christmas

     it may discourage people from giving gifts on any other day of the year besides that 1

     and one thing that you love about Christmas?

     it tends to make songwriters bring out their best

11.27.20  1:05 pm   How do you make intro to song if you have the good part already?

      this is difficult. sometimes you just have to move forward from the part you have, and then hopefully some solutions will reveal themself

11.27.20  1:03 pm   I thought I found a message in the Mount Saint Helens is about to Blow Up song. But then I watched the Genius video featuring you, saying that there's no deep meaning. Is this normal or did I go crazy

      how dare you. i make my songs as deep as humanly possible, and if it's not deep enough, i scream at it and send it back into the factory and demand it come out even deeper. if you think i said it has no deep meaning, then they must have edited that very deceptively

11.27.20  12:46 pm   i have been playing a small electric keyboard and i can learn songs easily but i want to actually write songs but i literally have NO idea how. so any advice on the basics just to make a small song to get me started? also thank you for exisiting i love you

      the good news is, you can make the song go any way you want. the bad news is you have to decide

11.27.20  12:10 pm   How's your brain doing?

      pretty good

11.27.20  12:02 pm   what model of microphone do you use for your songs?

      regular

11.27.20  11:25 am   in "i can play" what is it exactly that you can play

      not specified. many options available. also that is not necessarily about me. it might be about you
